title: Replacing alfalfa-based total mixed ration with Moringa leaves for improving carcass and meat quality characteristics in lambs
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Khalid A. Abdoun, Gamaleldin M. Suliman, Ahmed A. Alsagan, Osman A. Altahir, Mohammed Y. Alsaiady, Elfadil E. Babiker, Mohammed A. Al-Badwi, Faisal A. Alshamiry, Ahmed A. Al-Haidary
